ValidationRule.description: Makes at least one of the current provider fields mandatory for Germany.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISBLANK(TEXT(DCC_Current_Provider__c)), ISBLANK(TF_Current_Provider__c), TEXT(Owning_Country__c) = "Germany", OR(RecordType.Name = "Head Office", RecordType.Name = "Shop", RecordType.Name = "IKA Head Office", RecordType.Name = "IKA In-Fill Head Office", RecordType.Name = "NKA Head Office", RecordType.Name = "NKA In-Fill Head Office"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must supply a value on the TF Current Provider and/or the DCC Current Provider fields.
